name: @f77/f77-hooks
description: Useful react hooks for everyday use
author: mavdmichael <michael+github@marknadsavdelningen.se>

scripts.postversion: git push --tags && yarn publish . --tag $npm_package_version --new-version $npm_package_version && git push && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
scripts.pub: yarn version --patch && yarn build && yarn publish
scripts.pub:minor: yarn version --minor && yarn build && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version
scripts.pub:major: yarn version --major&& yarn build && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version
scripts.1pub: yarn version --patch && yarn build && git commit -a -m 'Release $npm_package_version' && git push origin main && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version --tag $npm_package_version
scripts.1pub:minor: yarn version --minor && yarn build && git commit -a -m 'Release $npm_package_version' && git push origin main && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version --tag $npm_package_version
scripts.1pub:major: yarn version --major&& yarn build && git commit -a -m 'Release $npm_package_version' && git push origin main && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version --tag $npm_package_version
